title: Disney's Lilo & Stitch
subtitle: TRENDING CARTOON CHARACTER.
description: The image shows a sleeveless dark grey top with the text 'Stitch' on the front in pink font (W 7” X H 2.5”, 1 color). The back features a colorful upside-down illustration of Stitch holding Scrump, with detailed color separation (W 14” X H 16”, 7 colors) and the quote: 'THIS IS MY FAMILY. I FOUND IT, ALL ON MY OWN. IT’S LITTLE, AND BROKEN, BUT STILL GOOD. YEAH. ... OHANA MEANS FAMILY. FAMILY MEANS NOBODY GETS LEFT BEHIND OR FORGOTTEN.'

title: Streetwear Illustration Pattern
subtitle: URBAN FASHION CONCEPT.
description: This design features four illustrated men wearing casual streetwear outfits, standing side by side. The background is filled with minimal line art illustrations of various male faces in hats and glasses. The main characters are in muted tones with highlights of orange, yellow, blue, and brown. The main print dimensions are W 20” X H 27” with 7 colors, and an additional matching pattern section with 1 color.

title: Geometric Triangle Pattern
subtitle: MODERN ABSTRACT TEXTILE DESIGN.
description: This sleeveless garment features an all-over geometric print consisting of overlapping triangles in red, blue, and beige tones. Each triangle contains varied internal textures and patterns, including zigzags, stripes, and distressed effects. The design uses 3 colors and gives a bold, contemporary aesthetic.

title: Vintage Floral Typography Shirt
subtitle: DISTRESSED GRAPHIC FASHION PIECE.
description: The shirt design shows the phrase 'YOUR BRAND' in a distressed stencil font, overlaid with a detailed illustration of roses and butterflies. Above the main text is the phrase 'It is hard to CHASE the vibe and CATCH the vibe' in white uppercase letters. The design is placed on a brown button-up shirt. One side of the image shows the digital mockup, and the other shows the printed shirt.

title: Lanvin Split Graphic Shirt
subtitle: HIGH FASHION MIXED MEDIA PRINT.
description: This shirt design has a split style, half white and half brown stripes. The left side features a retro-style portrait of a woman with the text 'LANVIN' and other phrases like 'HOPE & ANCHOR' and 'OH, WHO’S “WE”?!'. The right side contains bold distressed typography reading 'LANVIN WE ONLY FOR DECOR' alongside vintage floral illustrations. The garment mockup shows the final printed shirt.

title: Horse Silhouette Dot Art Shirt
subtitle: MINIMALIST ANIMAL DESIGN.
description: This sleeveless black button-up shirt features a large central graphic of a galloping horse, created entirely with small white dots, giving it a dynamic and minimalist look. The design size is W 9” X H 9.4” with 1 color.

title: Focus Typography Shirt
subtitle: BOLD MOTIVATIONAL DESIGN.
description: This green T-shirt design features the word 'FOCUS' split into two parts: 'FOC' on the chest (W 12.1” X H 5.5”, 4 colors) and 'US' on the lower side panel (W 8.5” X H 4.8”, 3 colors). The typography has a textured metallic and pixelated style with subtle black, grey, teal, and white tones, accompanied by small motivational quotes within the letters.

title: Bugs Bunny Freedom Shirt
subtitle: CLASSIC CARTOON STREETWEAR.
description: This design features Bugs Bunny in sunglasses, a red hoodie, and black shorts, walking confidently under the large arched word 'FREEDOM' in maroon outlined letters. Below 'FREEDOM' is the text 'IS NECESSARY' in black, and at the bottom in script, 'Freedom is state of mind'. Design size W 8.2” X H 7.9”.
